context: Existing methods for open-vocabulary querying often rely on a manually set fixed empirical threshold to select regions based on their semantic feature distance to the query text embedding, which can lead to challenges in accurately identifying specific target areas. context: Existing methods for text-driven human motion generation often overfit specific motion expressions in the training data, which limits their ability to generalize to novel descriptions and restricts broader applicability.
